Parameters.name: 01TableBookingService
prompts: Hello, this is Janice. How Can I help you?
Hi, this is Jance. How can I assist you?
Hi Good Morning, Welcome to Gateway Enquiry Service.
Good Morning, This is Janice at your services do you need help?
Good Morning, Janice here. Can I help you with a restaurant booking?
Hello, are you hungry? I can help you find a restaurant near you.

Parameters.name: 02bookersname
prompts: May I know your name please
Can i know your name please
Your good name please
What is your name, for the record please
Can you type your name please
Please provide your name.

Parameters.name: 03phoneNumber
prompts: Please provide your mobile number
Can I take your mobile number?
May I have your mobile number please.
Can you give me a call back number.
Can you give me your mobile number
Can you give me a number on which we can contact you?

Parameters.name: 04location
prompts: Where do you want me to find a restaurant?
What location are you looking for a restaurant?
Any preferred location
Do you want me to search for a restaurant near you, if so what is your location
I can help you find a restaurant on your way, which way are you going
In which location do you want to find a restaurant

Parameters.name: 05cuisine
prompts: What is your cuisine preference?
What is the type of food you would like to have?
Do you want to have Chinese/Thai/Moghlai/South Indian/North Indian
Cusine preference Please?
Can you tell me what cuisine you would want to have today?
What cuisine do you want to have today?

Parameters.name: 06Budget
prompts: What is your budget for dinner tonight
Are you ok with a costly restaurant or want me to look for an economical one.
Budget preference please ?
Is it a special Night for you do you want to book a lavish restaurant?
What is your preference low/standard/high budget range
Are you looking for a pocket friendly or average or a lavish restaurant for tonight ?

Parameters.name: 07RestaurantConfirmation
prompts: Based on your preference above are the best I could find which one do you chose?
Based on your input you have provided I could find the above restaurants which one do you chose?
I could find these restaurants for you please chose any one to confirm
List of restaurants have been displayed as per your preference please chose to proceed
I see you are a food lover, The best is shown for you. Chose to proceed
I like your preference, they are much like mine. I have found quite a few restaurants. Please chose your destination place?

Parameters.name: 08Restauranthalt
prompts: If you are not interested in any of the above press exit to quit

Click exit to end session
